CSSFont.summary: The font CSS shorthand property sets all the different properties of an element's font. Alternatively, it sets an element's font to a system font.

remarks.para: As with any shorthand property, any individual value that is not specified is set to its corresponding initial value (possibly overriding values previously set using non-shorthand properties). Though not directly settable by font, the longhands font-size-adjust and font-kerning are also reset to their initial values.
